the problem

90%

women feel unsafe in public spaces

71%

experienced sexual harassment in a public space

5%

had experienced rape attempts since the age of 16

81%

of women restrict their behaviours due to the fear

we’re on a mission to build an empowered community to redefine safety in a public space for women, queer, and gender non-comforming people

gender inequality

Community

We believe in the power of community . There is nothing better than a community that realizes that we need to take care of each other. Flock is a safe space for like-minded people who want to fight for safety at night and believe in gender equality. Together, we are stronger!

Global

We believe in in embracing diversity.We are an international, diverse team and ALL of us face the same obstacle. Harassment leading to gender-specific oppression isn’t an issue of a nation, it’s a global challenge. We as an international team work on a solution that empowers FLINTA all over the world.

Solidarity

We believe in Co-operation. With Flock we offer a solution to give power back into your hands. This is about a world that has to change. We stand up for safety on the streets and human empowerment. Come to our side and become part of the change.
